name: Accelerated Media
tag_list: itv, interactive, television, advanced, advertising, agency
overview:
Accelerated Media is a collection of experienced emerging media specialists that provide strategy, development, implementation and analytic services for advertisers and programmers across multiple distribution platforms.

We navigate and aggregate the constantly evolving interactive television landscape, enabling our clients to interact with their customers and viewers in revolutionary and accountable ways. Our expertise has delivered unprecedented television ad ROI for multiple Fortune 500 advertisers, and accounts for some of the first, and most sophisticated iTV campaigns in the country.
